scripts.debug:helloworld: mkdir -p build/helloworld && asc src/contracts/helloworld/*.ts -t build/helloworld/untouched.wast --sourceMap --measure --noAssert --use abort=
scripts.debug:todolist: mkdir -p build/todolist && asc src/contracts/todolist/*.ts -t build/todolist/untouched.wast --sourceMap --measure --noAssert --use abort=
scripts.debug:bank: mkdir -p build/bank asc src/contracts/bank/*.ts -t build/bank/optimized.wast --sourceMap --measure --noAssert --use abort=
scripts.debug: npm run debug:helloworld && npm run debug:todolist && npm run debug:bank
scripts.release:helloworld: mkdir -p build/helloworld && asc src/contracts/helloworld/*.ts -t build/helloworld/optimized.wast -b build/helloworld/optimized.wasm -O3 --noDebug --sourceMap --measure --noAssert --use abort=
scripts.release:todolist: mkdir -p build/helloworld && asc src/contracts/todolist/*.ts -t build/todolist/optimized.wast -b build/todolist/optimized.wasm -O3 --noDebug --sourceMap --measure --noAssert --use abort=
scripts.release:bank: mkdir -p build/bank && asc src/contracts/bank/bank.ts -t build/bank/optimized.wast -b build/bank/optimized.wasm -O3 --noDebug --sourceMap --measure --noAssert --use abort=
scripts.release: npm run release:helloworld && npm run release:todolist && npm run release:bank
scripts.build: npm run debug && npm run release
